thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: steve

author: steve
title: steve
text: Whilst there wasn't a problem with the rentalcars.com website, the problem arose when picking up the vehicle, from 1stFirst car hire. Who wanted a far greater deposit than was documented on our confirmation. They also tried very hard to sell additional insurance, when we had already purchased full cover from Rentalcars.com. Their fee for renting a satnav was the same as purchasing one! we decided to use a map! Not that they gave us one! The whole process too almost an hour, after waiting the the que for our turn. Eventually we got things sorted and were shown to the car.
